attributes.action: Allow sitting, or lying down, outside more than 2 metres apart from strangers.
attributes.additional_details: The mental and physical wellbeing of the Public is badly affected by this restriction, and since it is basically wrong and not necessary it lowers the acceptance of the other logical rules.
attributes.background: It is illogical to allow walking, running and cycling outside but ban sitting, or lying down.

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition, the Government has updated the guidance on spending time outdoors, including allowing people to sit or lie down.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
